messages.msgSnippet: ... Aizu Matsudaira are tied to the Mito house by blood (a LOT of adoptions/marriages, mainly between Mito, Aizu, and the infamous/famous Ii of Hikone), so I m
messages.messageBody:
>'Course... that depends on whether or not this person is descended
>from Nariaki's son, ne? :-D
>
>phil (budding Mito fangirl)

Aizu Matsudaira are tied to the Mito house by blood (a LOT of
adoptions/marriages, mainly between Mito, Aizu, and the infamous/famous Ii
of Hikone), so I'm not surprised. Incidentally, the current head of the Mito
house, from what I understand, is Tokugawa Fumitake.

--M.

from the AIZU MATSUDAIRA....
